text: The Crawl is a live album by the Louis Hayes Sextet recorded at Birdland in 1989 and released on the Candid label. Louis Hayes catalog accessed April 18, 2017Louis Hayes Leader Entry accessed April 18, 2017Candid Records album entry accessed April 18, 2017 == Reception == The Allmusic review says, "With interesting modal originals to blow on, in addition to a blues and a pair of standards, this live session from 1989 has many memorable moments". == Track listing == # "Escape Velocity" (Clint Houston) – 6:20 # "The Crawl" (Mickey Tucker) – 9:21 # "Yesterdays" (Jerome Kern, Otto Harbach) – 8:42 # "Run Before the Sun" (Houston) – 10:00 # "Autumn in New York" (Vernon Duke) – 7:50 # "Blues in Five Dimensions" (Tucker) – 10:47 # "Bushman Song" (John Stubblefield) – 13:08 == Personnel == *Louis Hayes – drums *Charles Tolliver – trumpet *Gary Bartz – alto saxophone *John Stubblefield – tenor saxophone *Mickey Tucker – piano *Clint Houston – bass == References == Category:Louis Hayes live albums Category:1990 live albums Category:Candid Records live albums
title: The Crawl (Louis Hayes album)
